content.en: GPU Geospatial Acceleration: Researchers have been investigating the use of parallel software frameworks and GPU-based parallel computing to speed up the development and execution of geographical data processing applications. They have found that parallel algorithms encapsulate the complexity of parallel software frameworks and that GPU architecture is suitable for parallelizing geospatial analysis algorithms. Additionally, parallelization on GPUs can significantly speed up flow-accumulation calculations and improve the efficiency of landscape index calculation in urban areas.
content.da: GPU Geospatial Acceleration: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af parallelle software-rammer og GPU-baseret parallel computing for at fremskynde udviklingen og udførelsen af geografiske databehandlingsapplikationer. De har fundet ud af, at parallelle algoritmer indkapsler kompleksiteten af parallelle software-rammer, og at GPU-arkitektur er velegnet til at parallellisere geospatial analysealgoritmer. Derudover kan parallelisering på GPU'er markant fremskynde flow-akkumulationsberegninger og forbedre effektiviteten af landskabsindeksberegninger i byområder.
